actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to impose the social security earnings test on the retirement annuities of Members of Congress.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends title II (Old-Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to subject the retirement annuities of Members of Congress to the current earnings test.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to impose the social security earnings test on the retirement annuities of Members of Congress.
